title: Boy Meets Harem The Animation
synopsis: Based on the adult manga by Omina Tachibana. What do you get when you go on a school field trip to the southern islands, your plane crashes and the only survivors are the teacher you are in love with, two popular female classmates, and a hot flight attendant? Well, Naoki, his teacher, Momoka and Kana, and Asami are certainly actively trying their best to find that out... (Source: BakaBT)
